sentences.english: A welder wears goggles to protect his eyes from being burned.
sentences.chinese: 電焊工戴着護目鏡防止眼睛被灼傷。

sentences.english: BUG, Easi-Scan remote display, wrist monitor.
sentences.chinese: 遠程顯示器，通用護目鏡。

sentences.english: I used a pair of tinted safety goggles as part of the faceplate .
sentences.chinese: 我用了一雙染過色的護目鏡作爲面板的一部分。

sentences.english: Do not watch welding processes unless your eyes are properly protected.
sentences.chinese: 沒有正確的護目鏡，不要看燒焊作業。

sentences.english: Hundreds of enthusiasts wearing goggles catch a glimpse of the phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 數百位熱情人士戴著護目鏡捕捉日食現象的驚鴻一瞥。

sentences.english: Grease on the hands can easily get on goggles.
sentences.chinese: 手上的油脂膏容易沾到護目鏡上。

sentences.english: Last, put a glare screen3 on your monitor to reduce squinting.
sentences.chinese: 最後，在屏幕上加片護目鏡來減少眯眼。

sentences.english: Wear appropriatc protective clothing compatible chemical-resistant gloves and chemical safety goggles.
sentences.chinese: 穿戴防護服，防護手套和化學安全護目鏡。

sentences.english: "What about two goggles?" Wes wants to know next.
sentences.chinese: “那買兩個護目鏡呢？”維斯有些得寸進尺。

sentences.english: Protect arms with clothing; goggles are often advised.
sentences.chinese: 穿長袖衣保護手臂，建議戴護目鏡。

sentences.english: Wear goggles when you're doing carpentry or even yard work.
sentences.chinese: 當你幹木活甚至院子活時戴護目鏡。

sentences.english: I stared at the glasses that looked like swimming goggles with rose-coloured lenses.
sentences.chinese: 我盯着這副像是護目鏡的玫瑰色透鏡。
